meanings.definition: To have been printed using lithography.
meanings.sent1: The poster was lithoed with colorful images.
meanings.sent2: The book was lithoed with detailed illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The artist lithoed the menu on a giant rock for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were lithoed in her mind like ancient cave paintings.
meanings.sent5: The landscape lithoed in vibrant colors on the canvas.

meanings.definition: To have been reproduced using lithography.
meanings.sent1: The map was lithoed for distribution to all students.
meanings.sent2: The artwork was lithoed for sale in art galleries.
meanings.sent3: The joke was lithoed on the office printer for a laugh.
meanings.sent4: His words were lithoed in the minds of the audience like printed copies.
meanings.sent5: The design was lithoed on the packaging for a professional look.
